title: Crusader: No Remorse
content:
Well, I could only remember originally playing this one twice, and it was many years ago (like ten), but recently I bought it off of eBay.

Receiving it today, I loaded it up and started playing.

What a sexy, sexy game.

Find out more at: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crusader_(computer_game)]en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cru...uter_game)[/url]--------------------
[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/]Cerebral Cortex 314[/url] - For All of your Commander Keen Needs.
[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/dave/joes.html]Eat at Joes[/url]

title: Loathing
content: I hate this game beyond all belief, it's not worth asking why.
